nodes.text: X-10 was a member of the Nihil marauder organization during the time of the High Republic Era. When a number of Nihil, including Eye of the Nihil Marchion Ro, were stationed on Quantxi, the Junk Moon of Ord Mantell, X-10 remained aboard their vessel. After the Nihil on the moon came under attack from the resident Junk Mavens, Ro ordered the marauder Zagyar to have X-10 ready the starship.
